Button with Link
format:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
    <title>My Page</title>
    <style>
        button {
            background-color: #000000;
            /* Green */
            border: none;
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 32px;
            text-align: center;
            text-decoration: none;
            display: inline-block;
            font-size: 16px;
            margin: 4px 2px;
            cursor: pointer;
            border-radius: 5px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            /* Add transition effect */
        }

        button:hover {
            background-color: #008CBA;
            /* Change color on hover */
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            /* Add a shadow */
        }

        button:active {
            transform: translateY(2px);
            /* Slightly move down on click */
            box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
            /* Add a more pronounced shadow */
        }

        .back-button {
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        .back-button:active {
            opacity: 0.5;
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>

    <button class="back-button" onclick="window.location.href='http://192.168.18.22:1880/refill/index.html';">Back</button>

</body>

</html>
